Mac PowerPC G5:
    Edit build/Makefiles/gmake/sysid.mak and change the M_ARCH := line to ppc7400.
    Run
	./configure --with-extra-ldflags="-undefined dynamic_lookup /usr/lib/dylib1.o"

Mac x86_64:
    (DON'T Edit build/Makefiles/gmake/sysid.mak and change the M_ARCH := line to x86_64.)
    Instead keep fingers crossed.

iOS:
    Run
	cd /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/usr/bin
	ln g++-4.2 armv6-apple-darwin10-g++-4.2
	ln gcc-4.2 armv6-apple-darwin10-gcc-4.2
	PATH=/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/usr/bin:$PATH
	./configure --target=armv6-apple-darwin10 --with-cxx="g++-4.2" --with-cc="gcc-4.2" --with-extra-cflags="-arch armv6 -D_DARWIN_C_SOURCE -D_STLP_THREADS -isysroot /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS4.2.sdk -I/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS4.2.sdk/usr/include/c++/4.2.1/armv6-apple-darwin10 -gdwarf-2 -mthumb -miphoneos-version-min=3.0" --with-extra-cxxflags="-arch armv6 -D_DARWIN_C_SOURCE -D_STLP_THREADS -isysroot /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS4.2.sdk -I/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS4.2.sdk/usr/include/c++/4.2.1/armv6-apple-darwin10 -gdwarf-2 -mthumb -miphoneos-version-min=3.0" --with-extra-ldflags="-arch armv6 -isysroot /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS4.2.sdk -gdwarf-2 -mthumb -miphoneos-version-min=3.0 -lgcc_eh -dead_strip /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS4.2.sdk/usr/lib/dylib1.o"

iOS Simulator:
    Run
	cd /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/usr/bin
	ln g++-4.2 i686-apple-darwin10-g++-4.2
	ln gcc-4.2 i686-apple-darwin10-gcc-4.2
	PATH=/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/usr/bin:$PATH
	./configure --target=i686-apple-darwin10 --with-cxx="g++-4.2" --with-cc="gcc-4.2" --with-extra-cflags="-arch i386 -D_DARWIN_C_SOURCE -D_STLP_THREADS -isysroot /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator4.2.sdk -I/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator4.2.sdk/usr/include/c++/4.2.1/i686-apple-darwin10 -gdwarf-2 -fmessage-length=0 -std=c99 -fpascal-strings -fasm-blocks -mmacosx-version-min=10.6 -fobjc-abi-version=2 -D__IPHONE_OS_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED=40200" --with-extra-cxxflags="-arch i386 -D_DARWIN_C_SOURCE -D_STLP_THREADS -isysroot /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator4.2.sdk -I/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator4.2.sdk/usr/include/c++/4.2.1/i686-apple-darwin10 -gdwarf-2 -fmessage-length=0 -fpascal-strings -fasm-blocks -mmacosx-version-min=10.6 -fobjc-abi-version=2 -D__IPHONE_OS_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED=40200" --with-extra-ldflags="/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneSimulator.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneSimulator4.2.sdk/usr/lib/dylib1.o -mmacosx-version-min=10.6 -Xlinker -objc_abi_version -Xlinker 2"

Windows:
    <cmd.exe> (can't run in msys)
    configure.bat msvc9
    cd build/lib
    nmake install
